verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: bluntly] [ARGM-MNR: pointedly] [V: asked] [ARG2: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu] [ARGM-LOC: in a private call] [ARG1: whether he legitimately cares about peace] .
President Donald Trump bluntly pointedly asked Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in a private call whether [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MNR: legitimately] [V: cares] [ARG1: about peace] .
